channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: NOISY roadworks at 10.30pm!!!, 26th January
item.description:
Why are such loud roadworks taking place at this time on a Monday night? Nightmare for the dozens of people living in the flats nearby who have jobs to go to in the morning.

Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Illegal Parking Blocking Access, 26th January
item.description:
Illegal Parking Blocking Access Hello, As you can see in the attached picture, people are using this area for parking, even though parking is not allowed here.Woodsford building Portland Street London The vehicles are blocking the entrance, which makes it impossible to remove the rubbish and access the area properly. Could you please send local officers to address this issue? Thank you for your assistance. Kind regards,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Portland Street, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
